question_1.question: What is the first step to add a new environment in TimeXtender according to the provided text?

options.option_a: Select the instances to include in the environment.
options.option_b: Navigate to Data estate > Environments and click Add environment.
options.option_d: Click on the edit icon to modify an existing environment.

question_1.explanation: The first step to add a new environment is to navigate to Data estate > Environments and click Add environment, as stated in the 'Add a new environment' section.

question_2.question: What must be true for an instance to be transferred to another in TimeXtender?

options.option_a: The instances must be part of the same environment.
options.option_b: The instances must be of different types.
options.option_c: The instances must be of the same type.
options.option_d: The source instance must not contain any metadata.

question_2.explanation: Instances can only be transferred to another instance of the same type, as mentioned in the 'Transfer Instances' section.

question_3.question: How can you undo a transfer of a data warehouse or semantic model instance in TimeXtender?

options.option_a: By deleting the instance and recreating it.
options.option_b: By using the standard version system in TimeXtender to revert to a previous version.
options.option_c: By transferring the instance back to the original environment.
options.option_d: By renaming the instance to its original name.

question_3.explanation: To undo a transfer, you can use the standard version system in TimeXtender to go back to a previous version, as described in the 'Undoing a transfer' section.

question_4.question: What should you do if you encounter the error 'MDW repository version not supported' during a transfer in TimeXtender?

options.option_a: Remove all instances from the environment and add them again.
options.option_b: Upgrade all instances before starting the transfer.
options.option_c: Ignore the error and proceed with the transfer.
options.option_d: Open a support ticket with TimeXtender.

question_4.explanation: The error 'MDW repository version not supported' suggests that an upgrade is needed for all instances before starting the transfer, as indicated by the user @Bitmetric_Maarten in the text.
